backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, access control checks, and progress storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of frontend file paths with brief descriptions for each component or hook.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global theme variables and styling for light/dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts, setting metadata, and mounting the app root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React root component setting up QueryClientProvider and rendering LoveGame.
frontend/src/game/components/ConfettiHea: Renders a random falling-hearts confetti animation.
frontend/src/game/components/FloatingHea: Displays floating animated heart elements for visual decoration.
Shows a radial animated heart burst at given coordinates, auto‑removing after 1s.
frontend/src/game/components/KeepsakeCar: Keepsake certificate component always using DEFAULT_NAME and enabling PNG download.
frontend/src/game/components/LevelTransi: Level wrapper that re-renders children with a simple transition keyed by level.
frontend/src/game/hooks/useFeedback.ts: Hook providing audio tones and vibration feedback when enabled.
frontend/src/game/levels/BonusSurpriseLe: Bonus level with an envelope-opening animation, timed compliments, and a continue button.
frontend/src/game/levels/CatchHeartLevel: Interactive level where players click a moving heart to gain points until unlocking the next stage.
frontend/src/game/levels/PromiseRevealLe: Displays promise cards that unlock on click, manages background music, and triggers a heart-burst effect.
frontend/src/game/levels/StartLevel.tsx: Start screen with login/reset options and a button to begin the game, handling Internet Identity auth.
frontend/src/game/levels/VictoryLevel.ts: Final celebration screen showing a keepsake card and a replay option with confetti and fireworks.
frontend/src/game/LoveGame.tsx: Main game controller switching between levels based on game state.
frontend/src/game/types.ts: Defines game state types, constants, and the list of promises used throughout the game.
frontend/src/game/useLoveGameState.ts: Hook managing global game state, personalization, progression, and backend sync with identity support.
frontend/src/game/utils/exportKeepsakePn: Generates and downloads a keepsake PNG using a certificate background, default name, and dedication text.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, managing login, logout, and identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Re-exports user progress hooks for easier imports across the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProgress.ts: Provides React Query hooks to load and save user progress via an actor, with caching and identity checks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based styles, color variables, animations, and themed UI effects for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, color mappings, animations, plugins, and content paths.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s state, features, and requirements, including updates about fixed-name behavior and UI changes.
